definition: to make a report after the event/to make a supplementary report/to repay a kindness
to repair/to patch/to mend/to make up for/to fill (a vacancy)/to supplement
Examination Yuan, the qualification and appointment board under the constitution of Republic of China, then of Taiwan/exam board
to sign up/to enter one's name/to apply/to register/to enroll/to enlist
to enter oneself for an examination
record entry (e.g. into a bank passbook)
to advertise an entrance examination for an academic institution (old)
to reconsider/to reexamine/to review (e.g. a report prior to accepting it)
to report to one's superiors/to appear in the news/to reply to a letter
to accept an applicant (prospective student, employee etc) who passes an entrance exam/to admit (a student)/to hire (a job candidate)
